item.title: Setup VPNC
item.description: Install pacman -Syu vpnc Configuration copy follwing configuration to /etc/vpnc/<name>.conf IPSec gateway vpn.pitt.edu IPSec ID sam_users IPSec secret ooL6ohho Xauth username guc25
